categories.description: Delicious pasta, pizza, and other Italian favorites.
Tasty noodle dishes from Asia and beyond.
Elegant sushi rolls and Japanese cuisine.
Tasty meals to fuel your afternoon.
Sumptuous dishes for a perfect evening meal.

instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Slice the tomatoes and arrange them on a baking sheet.
Drizzle olive oil over the tomatoes.
Sprinkle with minced ginger, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Roast in the oven for 25 minutes or until slightly caramelized.
Rinse and cook lentils in a pot with 3 cups of water for 20 minutes.
In a skillet, sauté onions, garlic, and carrots in olive oil for 10 minutes.
Add cumin, paprika, and salt to the skillet.
Mix lentils with the sautéed vegetables and serve warm.
In a large bowl, toss mixed greens with olive oil and lemon juice.
Top with sliced avocado, parsley, and cilantro.
Gently mix and serve immediately.
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, mix flour, cocoa powder, and sugar.
Add eggs, butter, vanilla, and milk. Mix until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased pan and bake for 30 minutes.
Let cool before serving.
Combine mixed berries, banana, yogurt, honey, and milk in a blender.
Blend until smooth and serve immediately.
In a bowl, mix lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Marinate chicken breasts in the mixture for 30 minutes.
Preheat grill to medium heat and cook chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side until fully cooked.
Serve with lemon wedges.
Heat sesame oil in a wok over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Add broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers; stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, mix mashed bananas, sugar, eggs, and melted butter.
Add flour, baking soda, and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased loaf pan and bake for 50-60 minutes.
Cool before slicing.
Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Add onions and garlic; sauté for 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth; simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend the soup until smooth, then stir in basil.
Serve warm.
Rub taco seasoning on fish fillets.
Cook fish in a skillet over medium heat for 4-5 minutes per side.
Warm tortillas and assemble with fish, cabbage, and sour cream.
Serve with lime slices.
Heat milk, pumpkin puree, sugar, and vanilla in a saucepan until hot.
Whisk until frothy.
Pour over a shot of espresso in a mug.
Top with pumpkin spice and serve.
Combine mangoes, red onion, cilantro, and jalapeño in a bowl.
Add lime juice and mix well.
Serve chilled with tortilla chips.
Dip eggplant slices in beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes, flipping halfway.
Layer marinara sauce, baked eggplant, mozzarella, and Parmesan in a dish.
Bake for another 20 minutes until cheese is bubbly.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté garlic for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 3-4 minutes.
Stir in lemon juice and parsley.
Toss with spaghetti and serve.
Arrange tomato slices, mozzarella, and basil leaves on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Serve immediately.
In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and sugar.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter until smooth.
Fold in blueberries gently.
Heat a skillet and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook the other side.
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway.
Serve hot.
Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add cream and Parmesan cheese, stirring until smooth.
Mix cooked pasta and sliced chicken into the sauce.
Serve hot.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until pink.
Stir in parsley and lemon juice before serving.
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Mix in eggs, vanilla, and baking soda.
Fold in flour and chocolate chips.
Scoop dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Toast the bread slices.
Spread mashed avocado evenly on each slice.
Sprinkle with salt and red pepper flakes.
Serve immediately.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet and pour mixture over them.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until fully cooked.
In a pot, sauté onions and bell peppers in olive oil.
Add tomatoes, beans, chili powder, and cumin.
Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix all ingredients in a bowl until combined.
Transfer to a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes.
Serve with chips or bread.
Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Stir in taco seasoning and simmer for 5 minutes.
Fill taco shells with beef, cheese, lettuce, and sour cream.
Serve immediately.
Cook spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente.
In a skillet, cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Drain spaghetti, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water.
Quickly toss hot spaghetti with egg mixture, pancetta, and reserved pasta water.
Season with black pepper and salt to taste.
Serve immediately.
Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with mozzarella slices and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil over the pizza.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Serve hot.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Brown ground beef in a skillet and mix with marinara sauce.
In a baking dish, layer noodles, ricotta, meat sauce, and mozzarella.
Repeat layers and top with Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until bubbly and golden on top.
Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
Cook fettuccine in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a pan, melt butter and stir in heavy cream.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix until smooth.
Toss cooked fettuccine with the sauce.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Bread chicken with breadcrumbs mixed with Parmesan cheese.
Cook chicken in a skillet until golden on both sides.
Place chicken in a baking dish and top with marinara and mozzarella.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve immediately.
Heat olive oil in a large pot.
Sauté onion, carrot, and celery until softened.
Add tomatoes, vegetable broth, and beans.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in pasta and cook until tender.
Season with basil and serve.
Heat chicken broth and keep warm.
Sauté onion in butter until soft.
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes.
Deglaze with white wine and cook until absorbed.
Gradually add broth, stirring constantly.
Stir in saffron and Parmesan before serving.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Bread eggplant slices with breadcrumbs.
Bake eggplant slices until crispy.
Layer eggplant with marinara and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes until bubbly.
Serve hot.
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Top with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Serve immediately.
Cook noodles according to package instructions and set aside.
Heat chili oil in a skillet and sauté garlic and Szechuan peppercorns until fragrant.
Add ground pork to the skillet and cook until browned.
Stir in soy sauce and mix well.
Toss noodles with the pork mixture.
Top with green onions and serve hot.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Toss cooked spaghetti with garlic butter.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and parsley.
Season with salt to taste and serve.
Cook noodles according to package instructions and drain.
In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, sesame oil, and minced garlic.
Toss noodles with the sauce mixture.
Top with green onions and sesame seeds before serving.
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions and set aside.
Stir-fry beef in a hot wok until browned and set aside.
Add cooked noodles to the wok with soy sauce and oyster sauce.
Toss in bean sprouts and green onions, and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot.
Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft, then drain.
In a skillet, scramble eggs and set aside.
Stir-fry shrimp until pink and set aside.
In the skillet, mix tamarind paste and fish sauce, and add noodles.
Toss in shrimp, scrambled eggs, and crushed peanuts.
Serve with lime wedges.
Cook fettuccine according to package instructions and drain.
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add heavy cream and Parmesan cheese, stirring to combine.
Toss cooked fettuccine and chicken in the sauce.
Serve hot.
Cook spaghetti and rinse with cold water.
Mix peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and sesame oil to create the sauce.
Toss noodles with the sauce and top with cucumber.
Serve chilled.
Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Stir-fry ground pork with Szechuan peppercorns until cooked.
Mix chili oil and soy sauce, and toss with noodles.
Top with ground pork and green onions.
Serve immediately.
Cook udon noodles and set aside.
Stir-fry garlic and shrimp in sesame oil.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Toss in udon noodles and soy sauce.
Serve hot.
Cook lo mein noodles and drain.
Stir-fry vegetables with ginger in a hot wok.
Add noodles and soy sauce, and toss to combine.
Top with green onions and serve hot.
Soak rice vermicelli in warm water until soft and drain.
Stir-fry shrimp and vegetables in a wok.
Add curry powder and soy sauce, and toss with vermicelli.
Top with green onions and serve hot.
Spiralize zucchini to create noodles.
Toss zucchini noodles with pesto sauce.
Top with cherry tomatoes, Parmesan cheese, and pine nuts.
Serve raw or lightly sautéed.
Combine cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, feta cheese, and olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss to combine and serve.
Layer tomato slices, mozzarella, and basil leaves on a serving plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Serve immediately.
Combine rice vinegar, soy sauce, and sesame oil in a bowl.
Add cucumber slices and toss to coat.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
Combine cooked quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and feta cheese in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss and serve chilled.
Combine baby spinach, strawberries, feta cheese, and pecans in a bowl.
Drizzle with balsamic dressing and toss gently.
Serve immediately.
Combine chickpeas, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber in a bowl.
Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil.
Toss gently and serve.
Massage kale with olive oil until tender.
Add dried cranberries and sunflower seeds.
Drizzle with lemon juice and toss.
Serve chilled.
Combine watermelon, feta cheese, and mint leaves in a bowl.
Drizzle with lime juice and toss gently.
Serve immediately.
Combine cooked pasta, bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, and black olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with Italian dressing and toss to combine.
Serve chilled.
Combine corn, avocado, red onion, and cilantro in a bowl.
Drizzle with lime juice and toss gently.
Serve chilled.
Preheat grill to high heat.
Brush steaks with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill steaks for 3-4 minutes on each side for medium-rare.
Remove from grill and let rest for 5 minutes before serving.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Rub the chicken with butter, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Stuff the cavity with lemon halves and thyme.
Place chicken in a roasting pan and bake for 1 hour and 30 minutes, or until fully cooked.
Let rest for 10 minutes before carving.
In a skillet, melt butter and cook onions and mushrooms until softened.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Sprinkle with flour and stir to combine.
Add beef broth and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and cook for 2 minutes more.
Serve over noodles or rice.
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Rub lamb chops with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
Heat a skillet over high heat and sear lamb chops on both sides.
Transfer to the oven and bake for 8-10 minutes, or until desired doneness.
Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.
Preheat oven to 325°F (165°C).
Place ham in a roasting pan and score the surface.
In a bowl, mix honey, brown sugar, mustard, and cloves.
Brush glaze over the ham and bake for 1 hour and 30 minutes, basting every 20 minutes.
Let rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
Season pork chops with salt and pepper.
Sear pork chops in a skillet over medium-high heat until browned, then set aside.
In the same skillet, melt butter and add apples, brown sugar, and cinnamon.
Cook until apples are tender.
Return pork chops to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes more.
Serve warm.
Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C).
Rub ribs with brown sugar, paprika, garlic powder, and salt.
Wrap ribs in foil and bake for 2 hours.
Remove from oven and brush with BBQ sauce.
Grill or broil ribs for 5 minutes to caramelize the sauce.
Serve hot.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, mix ground turkey, breadcrumbs, egg, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and parsley.
Form into meatballs and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until cooked through.
Serve with marinara sauce or as desired.
Marinate beef cubes in teriyaki sauce for 30 minutes.
Thread beef and bell peppers onto skewers.
Grill skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and green onions before serving.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Butterfly the pork tenderloin and flatten slightly.
Spread spinach, feta cheese, and garlic over the pork.
Roll up and secure with kitchen twine.
Brush with olive oil and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
Soak chicken pieces in buttermilk for 1 hour.
In a bowl, mix flour, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Dredge chicken pieces in the flour mixture.
Heat oil in a deep skillet and fry chicken until golden and cooked through.
Drain on paper towels and serve.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat.
Spread sushi rice evenly on the nori sheet.
Place crab sticks, cucumber, and avocado in the center.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice into 6-8 pieces and serve.
Mix tuna with sriracha and mayonnaise.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread sushi rice evenly.
Place the spicy tuna mixture in the center.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice into pieces and serve with soy sauce.
Form small mounds of sushi rice.
Spread a small amount of wasabi on each rice mound.
Place a slice of salmon on top of each mound.
Serve with soy sauce and pickled ginger.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread sushi rice evenly.
Place avocado slices in the center.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice into pieces and serve.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread sushi rice evenly.
Place eel and cucumber in the center.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.
Drizzle eel sauce on top before serving.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread sushi rice evenly.
Place crab sticks and cucumber in the center and roll tightly.
Arrange slices of assorted fish and avocado on top.
Slice into pieces and serve.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread sushi rice evenly.
Place tempura shrimp and cucumber in the center.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice into pieces and serve with soy sauce.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread sushi rice evenly.
Place tempura shrimp and cucumber in the center and roll tightly.
Arrange avocado slices on top and drizzle with eel sauce.
Slice into pieces and serve.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread sushi rice evenly.
Place smoked salmon, cream cheese, and cucumber in the center.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice into pieces and serve.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread sushi rice evenly.
Place cucumber, carrot, and avocado in the center.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice into pieces and serve with soy sauce.
Form ground beef into 4 patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side.
Add cheese slices during the last minute of cooking to melt.
Assemble burgers with buns, lettuce, tomato, onion, and patties.
Serve immediately.
Form ground chicken into 4 patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 4-5 minutes per side, until fully cooked.
Toast burger buns and spread mayonnaise on each.
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, and chicken patties.
Serve immediately.
Form ground beef into 4 patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side.
Add cheese slices during the last minute of cooking to melt.
Assemble burgers with buns, ketchup, mustard, pickles, and patties.
Serve hot.
Cook veggie burger patties according to package instructions.
Toast burger buns and spread vegan mayonnaise on each.
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, avocado, and patties.
Serve immediately.
Form ground beef into 4 patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side.
Add cheese slices during the last minute of cooking to melt.
Assemble burgers with buns, BBQ sauce, bacon, and onion rings.
Serve immediately.
Form ground turkey into 4 patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 4-5 minutes per side.
Assemble burgers with buns, lettuce, tomato, mustard, and patties.
Serve immediately.
Cook mushrooms and onions in butter until softened.
Form ground beef into 4 patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side.
Add Swiss cheese during the last minute of cooking to melt.
Assemble burgers with buns, patties, and sautéed mushrooms and onions.
Serve hot.
Form ground beef into 8 small patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 2-3 minutes per side.
Add cheese slices during the last minute of cooking to melt.
Assemble sliders with buns, patties, pickles, and ketchup.
Serve immediately.
Form ground lamb into 4 patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 4-5 minutes per side.
Assemble burgers with buns, feta cheese, lettuce, cucumber, and tzatziki sauce.
Serve immediately.
Form ground bison into 4 patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or skillet over medium heat for 4-5 minutes per side.
Assemble burgers with buns, lettuce, tomato, caramelized onions, and mustard.
Serve immediately.
In a bowl, layer quinoa, chickpeas, sweet potato, and spinach.
Drizzle with tahini and lemon juice.
Serve immediately.
Blend cashews, nutritional yeast, plant-based milk, garlic powder, and salt until smooth.
Heat the sauce in a saucepan until thickened.
Toss cooked macaroni with the sauce and serve.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with syrup or fruit.
In a pot, sauté onion until translucent.
Add tomatoes, beans, chili powder, and cumin.
Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.
Heat black beans in a skillet.
Fill taco shells with beans, avocado, lettuce, and salsa.
Serve immediately.
In a pot, sauté onion, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add lentils, broth, and tomato paste.
Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.
In a pot, simmer coconut milk and curry powder.
Add potato and cook until tender.
Stir in chickpeas and spinach.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
Cook rice noodles and set aside.
Sauté tofu until golden and mix with peanut butter, soy sauce, and lime juice.
Toss noodles with the sauce and top with green onions.
Serve immediately.
Fill tortillas with rice, beans, corn, guacamole, and salsa.
Wrap tightly and serve.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Sauté onion, carrots, and peas until softened.
Add lentils and vegetable broth and simmer for 5 minutes.
Transfer mixture to a baking dish and spread mashed potatoes on top.
Bake for 20 minutes or until golden.
Serve hot.
Lay the tortilla flat and spread ranch dressing evenly.
Add grilled chicken, lettuce, and tomato.
Wrap tightly and serve.
Layer tomato, mozzarella, and basil on the bread.
Brush olive oil on the outside of the bread.
Grill in a panini press or skillet until golden and cheese is melted.
Serve warm.
Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt.
Spread avocado mixture on toasted bread.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes and serve.
Heat sesame oil in a skillet.
Add broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers, and stir-fry until tender.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve with rice or noodles.
Combine lettuce, chicken, Parmesan cheese, and croutons in a bowl.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Serve immediately.
Sauté onion, carrots, and celery in a pot until softened.
Add lentils and vegetable broth, and bring to a boil.
Simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender.
Serve hot.
Combine quinoa, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and feta cheese in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss to combine and serve chilled.
Spread mayonnaise on one slice of bread.
Layer turkey, avocado, and lettuce.
Top with the other slice of bread, cut in half, and serve.
Combine cooked pasta, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with Italian dressing and toss.
Serve chilled.
Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place cheese between the unbuttered sides of the bread.
Cook in a skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with syrup and toppings of choice.
Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Pour the egg mixture into the skillet and cook, stirring gently, until fluffy.
Serve immediately.
Spread mashed avocado on toasted bread.
Top each slice with a poached or fried egg.
Sprinkle with salt and red pepper flakes, and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.
Cook oats in milk or water according to package instructions.
Top with blueberries, strawberries, and honey.
Serve warm.
Lay the tortilla flat and fill with scrambled eggs, cheese, salsa, and avocado.
Roll tightly and serve warm.
Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla in a bowl.
Dip bread slices into the mixture, coating both sides.
Cook on a skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with syrup or powdered sugar.
Whisk eggs in a bowl and set aside.
Sauté spinach and mushrooms in butter until softened.
Pour eggs into the pan and cook until set.
Sprinkle cheese on one half and fold the omelette over.
Serve warm.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Whisk eggs, spinach, bell peppers, cheese, and salt in a bowl.
Pour mixture into a greased muffin tin.
Bake for 20 minutes or until set.
Serve warm or store for later.
In a glass, layer yogurt, granola, and berries.
Drizzle with honey.
Repeat layers and serve immediately.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti and garnish with Parmesan cheese.
Preheat grill to medium heat.
Brush salmon fillets with olive oil and season with lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Serve immediately with your choice of sides.
Cook fettuccine according to package instructions and set aside.
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add heavy cream and Parmesan cheese, stirring until smooth.
Toss cooked fettuccine and chicken in the sauce.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve hot.
Heat sesame oil in a skillet or wok.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers, and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté onions and mushrooms until tender.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Pour in beef broth and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and heat gently.
Serve over noodles or rice.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Layer noodles, ricotta, spinach, marinara sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and top with Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 40 minutes or until bubbly.
Let rest for 10 minutes before serving.
Mix soy sauce, honey, ginger, and garlic in a bowl.
Marinate chicken thighs in the mixture for 30 minutes.
Cook chicken in a skillet over medium heat until cooked through, about 6-8 minutes per side.
Serve with rice and vegetables.
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook ground turkey in a skillet until browned.
Mix turkey with rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff bell peppers with the mixture and place in a baking dish.
Top with cheese and bake for 25 minutes.
Serve hot.
Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C).
Rub ribs with brown sugar, paprika, and garlic powder.
Wrap ribs in foil and bake for 2 hours.
Brush with BBQ sauce and grill or broil for 5 minutes.
Serve hot.
In a pot, cook potato, carrots, and cauliflower until tender.
Add coconut milk and curry powder, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
